description:
ssh: use *rsa.PublicKey or *dsa.PublicKey in interfaces.

Everywhere else in the code base, when we have an interface{} which is
a stand in for a public key, we use *foo.PublicKey rather than
foo.PublicKey. This change makes ssh reflect that.

messages.text:
Hello dave@cheney.net (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://agl%40golang.org@code.google.com/p/go.crypto/

*** Submitted as 53e036e53a3c ***

ssh: use *rsa.PublicKey or *dsa.PublicKey in interfaces.

Everywhere else in the code base, when we have an interface{} which is
a stand in for a public key, we use *foo.PublicKey rather than
foo.PublicKey. This change makes ssh reflect that.

R=dave, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5686067
LGTM. Thanks for cleaning this up.

Hi agl,

Are you using latest codereview.py?
